DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Africa. The aim of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of Levemir® treatment for insulin naive patients with type 2 diabetes under normal clinical practice conditions in Algeria.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Levemir® in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Informed consent obtained before any trialrelated activities Type 2 diabetes HbA1c between 79% Insulin naive Inadequate control with oral antidiabetics therapy as judged by investigator Patients with type 1 diabetes Hypersensitivity to Levemir® or to any of the excipients Pregnancy, or desire of pregnancy within next 6 months HbA1c greater than or equal to 9% Known or suspected allergy to the trial product or to any of the excipients Subjects who are unlikely to comply with protocol
